sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const About = () => (

About

{/* About Me */}

About Me

I am an experienced indexer with many years in the indexing business, the sole proprietor of Bhavya Solutions Indexing and its only indexer. Indexing projects are never subcontracted. I compile informative indexes that reflect the well the style, concepts and topics convered in the text. I specialize in back-of-the-book indexing, embedded indexing, and abstracting services.

I was featured in the spotlight section of the October 2022 issue of ASI's monthly newsletter, see also and Summer 2023 edition of the ISC/SCI Bulletin.

{/* Education */}

Education

  • Specialized certificate in copyediting from University of California, San Diego.
  • Indexing training course from the American Society of Indexing (ASI).
  • Taxonomy and controlled vocabulary training course from taxonomist Heather Hedden, June 2020
  • Climbing Camelback: Intermediate and Advanced Topics in Indexing, ASI 2019 Conference, Scottsdale
  • Practical Introduction to Indexing, ASI 2013 Conference, San Antonio
  • BS (Biology), MBA(Operations), Professional Diploma in Web Centric Computing

{/* Professional Memberships and Voluntering */}

Professional Memberships and Volunteering

  • American Society for Indexing
  • Indexing Society of Canada / Société canadienne d’indexation (ISC/SCI)
  • Editorial Freelancers Association
  • ASI membership commitee - Chair

); export default About;
